trans-unit.source: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

trans-unit.source: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.
trans-unit.target: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

trans-unit.resname: PCON·140★ | Obelisk of Alara | Card Name
PCON·140★ | Obelisk of Alara | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life. {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life. {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
